entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/ClimaAtmos.jl
entry.content: ClimaAtmos.jl is a library for building atmospheric circulation models that is designed from the outset to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools. We welcome contributions!

entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/ClimaCoupler.jl
entry.content: ClimaCoupler: bringing atmosphere, land, and ocean together

entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/Oceananigans.jl
entry.content: ðŸŒŠ Julia software for fast, friendly, flexible, ocean-flavored fluid dynamics on CPUs and GPUs

entry.title: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General
entry.content: The official registry of general Julia packages

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/Catalyst.jl
entry.content: Chemical reaction network and systems biology interface for scientific machine learning (SciML). High performance, GPU-parallelized, and O(1) solvers in open source software.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/LinearSolve.jl
entry.content: LinearSolve.jl: High-Performance Unified Interface for Linear Solvers in Julia. Easily switch between factorization and Krylov methods, add preconditioners, and all in one interface.

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
entry.content: High performance ordinary differential equation (ODE) and differential-algebraic equation (DAE) solvers, including neural ordinary differential equations (neural ODEs) and scientific machine learning (SciML)

entry.title: https://github.com/SciML/SciMLSensitivity.jl
entry.content: A component of the DiffEq ecosystem for enabling sensitivity analysis for scientific machine learning (SciML). Optimize-then-discretize, discretize-then-optimize, adjoint methods, and more for ODEs, SDEs, DDEs, DAEs, etc.
